item.title: Introducing Kubeform - Provision cloud resources using Kubernetes CRDs & Terraform
item.description: Kubeform by AppsCode is a Kubernetes operator for Terraform. Kubeform provides Kubernetes CRDs for Terraform resources and modules so that you can manage any cloud infrastructure in a Kubernetes native way. You just write a CRD for a cloud infrastructure, apply it and Kubeform will create it for you! Kubeform currently supports 5 top cloud platforms.
